name: Fennel and Black Olives
keywords: black olives, fennel, dairy-free, gluten-free, low calorie, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 6 large Italian, French or Greek black olives

recipeInstructions.text: Wash fennel bulb and trim off leaves and stems. Slice off bottom of bulb; then, thinly slice the remainder of it and separate into rings. Arrange on two salad plates.
Pit olives, and sprinkle over fennel. Dribble olive oil on top.
